description: Created to be your favourite all-round trekking trousers from spring to autumn, their new Keb Agile Trousers combine low weight and high movability in a hard-to-resist format. Made from a double-woven stretch fabric that dries quickly and protects legs from bruises in rough terrain. The design is minimalistic with tapered legs, and the leg pockets and knees are in G-1000 Lite Eco Stretch for extra durability.
name: Fjallraven Keb Agile Trousers, Short - Mens
